title: A Diagnostic Benchmark for Sweden-Related Factual Knowledge
summary: Many Swedish benchmarks are translated US-centric benchmarks, and therefore not suitable for testing knowledge that is particularly relevant, or even specific, to Sweden. We therefore introduce a manually written question-answering benchmark specifically targeted to Sweden-related personalities and events, many of which receive very limited coverage in international media.
